name: Scheduler - Snowflake Country/Subsidiary
description:
**Trigger**: It will trigger every day at 12AM

**Description**: Snowflake is utilized as our code repository for enterprise reference data. In order to capture consistent country data to be utilized across business systems, we have created a COUNTRY reference code repository table. We would like this table to be dynamically updated with ISO 3166 data as that data is updated. To do this, we will utilize https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/all  as our source for country data. We want this data to create/update automatically on a daily schedule.

Actions: 

1. A new record is created in the  COUNTRY table and the 2ALPHA_CODE, COUNTRY_NAME, 3APLHA_CODE, NUMERIC_ISO, REGION, SUBREGION are captured. The record will have a "CLEARED" STATUS_EMBARGOED value and a "TRUE" ACTIVE value unless updated.
2. The reconciled Country in the COUNTRY table has the "ACTIVE" field flagged to FALSE.
3. The COUNTRY_NAME,ALPHA3 Code, Region, Subregion, Numeric Code,R7 Alias is updated in the COUNTRY table for the updated country.
4. All history of changes should be accessible for audit
5. All changes should notify the following slack channel: #ref_data_management
6. If any errors are hit, the  following slack channel should be automatically notified: #ref_data_management

code.name: scheduled_event
code.description: Trigger every 1 days at 12:00:00 AM

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every

Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_at
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at
extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

extended_input_schema.name: timezone
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)
